page.title: 18THE ILFORD 'RAJAR' WORKS
page.content: The Rajar Works was built in 1903 and in 1907 Rajar Ltd. was formed to manufacture photographic films, plates and cameras. In 1928 this company was absorbed by Ilford Ltd. of Essex. In June 1980, Ilford Ltd. announced that they were transferring the centre of their operation from the town of Ilford to Mobberley. Much new and extensive building work has taken place to provide sites for the production of monochrome photographic materials, research centre,and distribution, admin, and marketing facilities. Over 900 new jobs were created on this site bringing the workforce to a total of 1400.
